statements: SELECT * FROM volunteer_rewards ORDER BY volunteer_id DESC, recognition_date ASC
SELECT volunteer_name, reward_name FROM volunteer_rewards WHERE reward_points > 50
SELECT volunteer_name, reward_name, recognition_date FROM volunteer_rewards WHERE volunteer_id = 3
SELECT reward_name, volunteer_name, reward_points FROM volunteer_rewards WHERE recognition_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT volunteer_name FROM volunteer_rewards WHERE reward_points < 30
SELECT volunteer_name, reward_name, reward_points FROM volunteer_rewards WHERE volunteer_id = 1 ORDER BY recognition_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT reward_name, reward_points, recognition_date FROM volunteer_rewards WHERE reward_points > 50 ORDER BY recognition_date ASC
SELECT volunteer_id, volunteer_name, reward_name, reward_points, recognition_date FROM volunteer_rewards ORDER BY volunteer_name, recognition_date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT volunteer_name, reward_name, recognition_date FROM volunteer_rewards WHERE recognition_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT volunteer_name, reward_name, reward_points FROM volunteer_rewards WHERE volunteer_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY reward_points DESC
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE reward_type = 'Gift Card'
SELECT reward_id, reward_date, volunteer_id FROM rewards WHERE reward_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_email FROM volunteer ORDER BY total_hours_logged DESC
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE reward_id = 3
SELECT volunteer_id, total_hours_logged FROM volunteer
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE reward_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_email FROM volunteer WHERE total_hours_logged > 50 ORDER BY volunteer_name DESC;
SELECT reward_type, COUNT(*) AS total_rewards FROM rewards GROUP BY reward_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT volunteer.volunteer_name, rewards.* FROM volunteer INNER JOIN rewards ON volunteer.volunteer_id = rewards.volunteer_id ORDER BY rewards.reward_date ASC, volunteer.volunteer_name ASC;
SELECT volunteer_name, SUM(total_hours_logged) AS total_hours FROM volunteer GROUP BY volunteer_name HAVING SUM(total_hours_logged) > 100 ORDER BY total_hours DESC;
SELECT * FROM rewards ORDER BY reward_id DESC;
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_email FROM volunteers WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT reward_name, reward_points FROM rewards WHERE reward_points > 50;
SELECT contribution_description FROM contributions WHERE volunteer_id = 3;
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_email, volunteer_phone FROM volunteers ORDER BY volunteer_name ASC;
SELECT reward_name, reward_points FROM rewards ORDER BY reward_points DESC;
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_email FROM volunteers WHERE volunteer_id = 3;
SELECT volunteer_name, contribution_date FROM volunteers JOIN contributions ON volunteers.volunteer_id = contributions.volunteer_id ORDER BY contribution_date DESC;
SELECT volunteer_name, reward_name, reward_points FROM volunteers LEFT JOIN rewards ON volunteers.volunteer_id = rewards.volunteer_id;
SELECT reward_name, reward_points, volunteer_name FROM rewards JOIN volunteers ON rewards.volunteer_id = volunteers.volunteer_id WHERE reward_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM rewards;
SELECT reward_name, reward_points FROM rewards ORDER BY reward_points DESC;
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_email FROM volunteers WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT contribution_id, contribution_date, contribution_description FROM contributions WHERE contribution_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT r.reward_name, v.volunteer_name, c.contribution_date FROM rewards r, volunteers v, contributions c WHERE r.reward_id = c.contribution_id AND v.volunteer_id = c.volunteer_id;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE reward_points > 100;
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_email FROM volunteers WHERE volunteer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT contribution_date FROM contributions ORDER BY contribution_date DESC;
SELECT reward_name, reward_points FROM rewards WHERE reward_points BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM redemption WHERE redemption_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM rewards;
SELECT reward_name, reward_type FROM rewards WHERE reward_type='Financial';
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_email, volunteer_phone FROM volunteers ORDER BY volunteer_name DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT contribution_id, volunteer_id, contribution_date FROM contributions ORDER BY contribution_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM rewards ORDER BY reward_name DESC;
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_email FROM volunteers WHERE volunteer_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT volunteer_name, contribution_date FROM contributions WHERE volunteer_id = 2;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT reward_name, reward_type, reward_description FROM rewards WHERE reward_type = 'Certificate';
